entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sechelt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:28 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sechelt 07:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: NNW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 early this afternoon except gusting to 80 near the Strait of Georgia this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h except gusting to 80 near the Strait of Georgia this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
